en-GB.summary: Learn fun facts about your local area.
en-GB.description: Learn fun and interesting facts about your local area based on your county! Currently I only know facts about counties in England but I'm always learning!
examplePhrases: Alexa ask local facts for a fact
Alexa tell local facts to tell me a fact
en-GB.name: Local Facts

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: The Skill only has one custom intent which fetches a fact based on the county in the user's address fetched from the API. Therefore to test the functionality your address needs to be in the UK Local Facts only has facts for UK counties.
